amendment.description: An amendment numbered 566 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used to require a person licensed under section 923 of title 18, United States Code, to report information to the Department of Justice regarding the sale of multiple rifles or shotguns to the same person.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boren amendment (A116) Agreed to by recorded vote: 277 - 149 (Roll no. 115).
